remarks: Equivalence of point-continuity in the parent topology and point-continuity in a subspace.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnprest.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
cnprest.2 $e |- Y = U. K $.
cnprest2 $p |- ( ( K e. Top /\ F : X --> B /\ B C_ Y ) -> ( F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` P ) <-> F e. ( ( J CnP ( K |`t B ) ) ` P ) ) ) $.
